author: jochembrouwer
content: Hey all, I think this EIP: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-684 (Revert creation in case of collision) is accepted right? What about the amendment https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7610 (Revert creation in case of non-empty storage)?

author: rodiazet
content:
On EVMMAX additional instructions which should be considered I would also add `ISZERO` (or something which helps with compering values in EVMMAX slots returning result on EVM stack) which helps a lot with  control flow. That's one of our thoughts after implementing some precompiles in EVMMAX as it's defined by 6690. More here https://notes.ethereum.org/@ipsilon/evmmax_in_evmone
This is a note prepared 6 months ago.
